topics.body:
death grips is fucking extreme man.

imagine the stereotype of a hip hop gangsta, who always says how he shot a nigga in the dick and he is living a hood life.

and then turn it up to 100x.

a guy who extremely depicts the way the murders people, how he cuts their libs and stuffs them,the bloody and the gore of the torture he sees, how his lifestyle is completely gritty, living paranoid and in constant drugs, on a shitty neigthborhood where you might as well be dead, who doesnt care about anyones life as long as he can get his part.

he even mocks other people´s tragedies by saying multiple times "show me something aint seen before"

and in "get got" he gets hallucinations of police that arent even there


this is even worse horrorcore than eminem or even odd future ever managed to paint (and this guys are known for talking about rape and mutilation), this guys just took the bar up to a million.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cb31346368723d7d4c0000#post_53cb31346368723d7d4c0000
That one rocks. I take it you've read Jingo then? Because even though the Lancre Witches books are my favorite group of stories Jingo is one of my all time favorite books.

"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cb31466368722b4a460000#post_53cb31466368722b4a460000
I recommend starting with Guards Guards!, the first Night's Watch book because that's where I think Pratchett really comes into his stride.

Also I cannot recommend the Dresden Files books enough. If you like them check out Butcher's other series, The Furies of Calderon. Its more straight up fantasy, but still goddamn excellent.
